Name: Nicolas Vieilles Vignes Grenache Noir
Wine Description: N/A

Name: The Stag Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Le Puits Sec Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Bright, electrifying acidity and focus with red fruits and earth. The wine starts with cherry, violet and damp leaves moving to tart cherry in the mid-palate and finishing with black cherry and fine tannins.

Name: Sapaio Bolgheri Volpolo
Wine Description: It has medium rich, light tannins that smoothed a bit over course of meal. Red fruit, aged red fruit, currants, spice, some earth and mineral backdrop. At times seemed restrained, but then this restraint was more a sign of the elegant crafting of the wine--enjoyable, and while a 'bordeaux blend' seemed to reflect its different roots.

Name: Dark (Red Blend)
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Abstract
Wine Description: The aromas are all berry and black fruits, with neatly integrated caramelized oak. A huge entry coats the mouth. The wine has tons of weight on the mid-palate and is dense with layers of ripe cherry and strawberries. The finish is laced with long soft tannins that go on and on.

Name: Convertible Rojo
Wine Description: Red cherry red wine with violet reflections showing marked aromas of red fruits such as blackberry and black cherry. Aging notes such as roasted coffee, cocoa, dark chocolate and orozuz. In the mouth it shows like a powerful wine with good attack and great body, balanced thanks to its good acidity and with ripe tannins very present but friendly and with good persistence.

Name: Historic Tinto
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Toscana
Wine Description: Organic Toscana has a deep garnet color and has an intense bouquet, elegant and fruity, with lovely aromas of violets. On the palate is full, warm with perfectly balanced tannins with hints of licorice, spice and red fruits. "Full and Soft, Fun and Funcky Organic Wine.

Name: Zinfandel James Gang Reserve
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Brisa Merlot
Wine Description: Colour: Bright red with violet highlights. Aroma: Black plums, cherries and strawberries, with delicate notes of vanilla and toffee. Flavour: Fresh fruit, with friendly tannins, and juicy, balanced acidity.

Name: Kedungu
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Red Rex
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: This luxurious Cabernet Sauvignon offers aromas of blackberry, raspberry compote, plum and warm winter spices, as well as hints of lavender. The dark fruit layers are echoed on the palate, where they mingle with notes of dark chocolate, coffee, and star anise, with plush, velvety tannins carrying the wine to a long, rich finish.

Name: Seriously Old Dirt
Wine Description: Aromas of black currant, black cherries, balsamic and fruitcake, lifted with warm aromas of nutmeg and all spice. The palate is soft on entry, a luscious mouth feel with a firm acidity.

Name: Indian Wells Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: “The Indian Wells Cabernet is our warm climate ripe, jammy ‘New World’ style of Cabernet Sauvignon. The wine offers dark fruit aromas and flavors. Syrah added an enhanced richness and concentration to the wine.”

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: An exciting, yet friendly wine, bursting at the seams with aromas of macerated tart cherries, pomegranate and notes of earth of pine. The flavors combine both sweet and tart with a fruit driven front palate and very subtle oak influence. The finish is bright, slightly herbal, and delicate making this an excellent food wine, as well as a charming drinking experience by itself.

Name: Etna Rosso
Wine Description: Fresh, fragrant, beautifully slender and with a fine grip. It has a natural polish and by aging it gathers into rich complexity.

Name: Chelsea Goldschmidt Merlot
Wine Description: Ink black color; intense plum and blackberry aromas with juicy red and black fruit flavors. Full-bodied and dense, the palate is lush and finishes with velvety tannins and spice.

Name: Rioja Crianza
Wine Description: It has ruby red, very clean and bright. It is Aromas complex aromas of ripe grapes, with a touch of oak, very intense and balanced. It is Concentrated and complex, with body and power, very well structured and lingering aftertaste. With touch and balsamic notes of red fruits.

Name: Men de Mencía
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Barbera d'Alba
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: San Simeon Pinot Noir is a rich, fruit-driven wine with ripe flavors of black cherry and raspberry. The mouth is soft and round with a lingering finish. Aromas of bright red fruit, cinnamon, and oak spice are revealed on the fragrant nose.

Name: Pinotage
Wine Description: The color is an attractive bright ruby red with a purple rim, he flavors of this unique South African cultivar are complex and exciting with ripe plum and fruitcake all beautifully integrated and then finished with subtle oak to for a lingering aftertaste.

Name: Hilltop Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: The wine is darkly-colored with a red-purple hue. Varietal aromas of violet and ripe black plum are complemented by hazelnut, dark chocolate and espresso coffee. The dense but approachable mid-palate is followed by a round, intense fruit finish. Aromas of violet, ripe black plum and hazelnut. Round, intense fruit finish.

Name: Rafaèl Valpolicella Classico Superiore
Wine Description: Intense ruby red in colour, on the nose has dried spices perfumes, with accents of leather and cherry flavours. The taste is fairly intense, spicy with sweet cherry flavours. Well balanced and pleasantly tannic.

Name: Bordeaux
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Langhe Nebbiolo
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Saia
Wine Description: Bright, intense ruby red colour, with alternating sensations of mature fruit and sweet, elegant notes of spice. Explosive flavour and full body, yet very fresh, bursting with charisma.

Name: 667 Pinot Noir
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Givry 'Sous La Roche'
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Angeli Cuvée
Wine Description: The Angeli Cuvée is a big, rich wine that is generous in its flavors and aromas of dark berries, graphite, briar patch, and hints of oak. The mouth feel is lush and full with a structured, long finish.

Name: Peiragal Barbera d'Alba
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Los Osos Merlot
Wine Description: The wine presents a mature red color with a raspberry hue. Red fruit aromas of plum and pomegranate are integrated with a barrel signature of dark chocolate and baking spice. Whole berry fermentation with a generous use of Malbec as a blender accentuates the brighter fruit tones of Merlot and leaves ripe, soft tannins on the palate.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon Estate
Wine Description: The aromas hint at black fruit: ripe black cherries and black plums. Enticing barrel qualities of cola and spice complement the fruit aromas. On the palate, the wine shows layers of deeply extracted flavors that only mature hillside vineyards can give

Name: Bordeaux Supérieur
Wine Description: Deep garnet in colour. Red fruit on the nose and licorice on the palate. Concentrated, balanced, with fine tannins of roasted coffee. It has a very good raging potential.

Name: Rapsodia Reserva Malbec
Wine Description: The delicate floral notes typical of the area together with mineral flavors and sweet spices give great complexity and long persistence in mouth.

Name: Foradori - Teroldego
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Tinto
Wine Description: It has purity of fruit accompanies concentrated texture and weight, with excellent balance and expression enhanced by two years in bottle prior to release.

Name: Single Vineyard Xinomavro Ramnista
Wine Description: Ripe, rich, complex and intense. This vintage has found its balance at elevated acidity and alcohol levels with robust tannins that create a long finish. Its concentrated bouquet of red fruit and pralines when young, evolves into hints of sun-dried tomato, black olive, truffle and sandalwood.

Name: Origine Cahors
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Zinfandel (Special Reserve)
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Domaine de Valmoissine Pinot Noir
Wine Description: It has an intense beautiful and brilliant ruby color. The nose is powerful with cherry aromas. The mouth is harmonious and offer a great balance, the final have already fine tannins which will quickly become silky.

Name: Old Vine Petite Sirah
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Offers textbook varietal character with plenty of black currant, loamy earth, licorice and pepper notes. Medium-bodied with silky tannins and good fruit.

Name: Chateau Raspail Gigondas
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Ochetti Nebbiolo
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Dioro Rioja
Wine Description: Dark ruby color. Aromas of cherry, currant, vanilla bean and hint of tar. Full-bodied, with flavors of cherries, cocoa powder and oak. A touch of sweetness on entry with a little bit of air with soft tannins that are starting to integrate well.

Name: Langhe Nebbiolo
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Inscription Pinot Noir
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Mt. Tabor Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Medium to full bodied and pleasant to drink. The wine was especially created for moments of joy, closeness and good friendship. It is fresh and fruity and carries the spirit of Mount Tabor.

Name: Firagnetti Langhe Nebbiolo
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Koonunga Hill Shiraz - Cabernet
Wine Description: Color: bright crimson red. Nose: A youthful koonunga hill disposition arises. dark sour-cherry, blackberry, rhubarb fruits abound. aromas of malt/oats/wheat germ with a green olive and pomegranate alert. integrated, supportive oak awoken. Palate: compact, defined. pomegranate/plum/dark berry fruits. a white chocolate mousse/creamy dairy chocolate flavour/texture amalgam. on the finish, a charry/smokey impression (oak ?).

Name: Montepulciano d'Abruzzo
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Poggio gli Angeli Sangiovese
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Celeste Crianza
Wine Description: Dark cherry red with garnet highlights. Intense dark fruit aroma (wild blackberries, blueberry jam) with smoky and roasted (coffee) notes against a wonderfully elegant oaky backdrop. A serious wine with juicy tannins, velvety and round thanks to the perfume of oak aging (dried plums).

Name: Saint-Émilion Grand Cru
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Oratorio Gigondas
Wine Description: It has deep ruby with freshness marked by its dark purple reflections. Very intense and powerful, an instant expression of this great terroir; the complexity is puzzling; at first crystallized black fruits then notes of soft spices vanilla milk chocolate, spices on a balsamic base and meaty. Remarkable scale, harmoniously marrying the aromatic power, sweetness, silky tannins and the remarkable freshness; all concluded by a magnificent length on black licorice fruits.

Name: Bordeaux Rouge
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Frappato (di Vittoria)
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Chianti Classico
Wine Description: Ruby ​​red in colour with intense varietal aromas of cherry, plum and violet notes in the nose. In the mouth fresh, balanced and distinctive.

Name: Xisto Ilimitado
Wine Description: N/A

Name: The Stump Jump Shiraz
Wine Description: It is chock-full of fresh blackberries, cherries and dark chocolate sprinkled with spices. The palate is fresh and juicy, ripe red fruits mix with plums, blackcurrant, flowers and a twist of black pepper.

Name: Megahertz Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: An aromatic lift of fresh cherry, dry thyme and toasted black peppercorn abound from the glass. On the pallet, flavors of black cherry, racy black berry and plum compote frame the heart of this wine. Firm tannin's, balanced acidity and compelling layers of semi-sweet chocolate and dark roast espresso beans defines the long and layered finish of this wine.

Name: District One Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Harvey & Harriet
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Guadalupe Vineyard Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Savory notes of shitake mushroom and turned earth are brightened by red currant, raspberry and rhubarb. Lively and lithe on the palate with beautiful color, aroma and concentration.

Name: Outis Nessuno Rosso
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Arienzo Crianza
Wine Description: A fresh, fruity wine with a lovely attack, bringing a reminder of red-berried fruit mingling with the coconut and vanilla aromas from the oak. Full and supple with a long finish. A wine with character which showcases the quality of the grapes used to make it.

Name: Famiglia Zingarelli Chianti Classico
Wine Description: Color: lively ruby red. Nose: intense and persistent with hints of wild berries that combine well with the aromas released by the wood of the barrels. Taste: savory and full bodied, it highlights the exceptional persistence of the bouquet.

Name: Dornfelder Red
Wine Description: Aromas of cherries and red berries. It is a medium-bodied young red wine with an excellenet up front fruity flavor that lingers on the palate.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Blackberry, plum, allspice, and vanilla. Serve with top loin of beef or a savory lamb stew.

Name: Les Fiefs de Lagrange Saint-Julien
Wine Description: Lively, intense color, without premature evolution. The nose has a fine, elegant character with aromas of ripe fruit and slightly woody notes. In the mouth, the balance is long and consistent. The aftertaste brings out the purity of the fruit thanks to moderate tannins.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Tinto
Wine Description: Bright violet colour. Fresh raspberry and floral aromas, with notes of star anise and cracked pepper adding complexity. Juicy, palate-staining red fruit flavors show excellent depth and energy, with no rough edges. Quite elegant and open-knit, finishing with impressive cling and lingering spiciness.

Name: Dido Tinto
Wine Description: This wine offers fresh aromas and flavors of red berry fruit, minerals and toasted oak. Aged for 18 months in concrete and foudres, it is richly endowed with fruit and soft round tannins on the finish.

Name: Montepulciano d'Abruzzo
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Phantom Proprietary Red
Wine Description: Three distinctive varietals combine lush berry and fierce spice into a wine characterized by its incandescence. Deeply luscious and succulent blackberries ignite this vintage of our rich ruby apparition. Aromas of anise and sweet fig are embraced by touches of black pepper. From the shadowed dark depths, subtle notes of cloves and vanilla emerge and compliment the concentrated fruit characters of this wine.

Name: Métier Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Reserve Organic Malbec
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Valpolicella
Wine Description: A limpid, ruby-red wine with glints of purple. Intense, quite complex, it has a ne quality aroma with a heady, fruity and oral overtones

Name: Vint Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Our Cabernet Sauvignon comes from cool-climate Central Coast grapes and has been blended with Syrah and small amounts of Merlot, Malbec and Petite Sirah. The wine has the sweet black cherry and dark berry fruit character that distinguishes California’s finest Cabernet Sauvignons, and its ripe fruit is supported by velvety tannins and well-integrated oak.

Name: Prati Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Knights Valley Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: The Knights Valley has a vibrant fruit core, hints of brown spice and pink peppercorns, and a lingering finish of ripe black fruit. A bit of Merlot was added to this wine to round out the mid-palate and a touch of Cabernet Franc lifts the aromatics of the wine and delivers an elegant finish.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Sonoma Coast Pinot Noir
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: This is a wine that, when opened and readily consumed, embraces the red meats and flavorful cheeses, yet when decanted broadens into a complex and versatile wine with almost unlimited food parings.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Aromatics of bright red cherry, red raspberry and dried thyme qualities that mingle with darker elements of black cherry, espresso and cassis. The palate is full of ripe fruits and balanced tannins.

Name: Margaux
Wine Description: N/A

Name: La Storia Merlot
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Traditions Merlot
Wine Description: It has deeply colored and ripe with plums, cherries, toasted oak and blackberries. Rich, ripe and generous, it is smooth.

Name: Ancient Vines Zinfandel
Wine Description: A deep purple color and luscious flavors of black cherry, strawberry, and dark chocolate lead to a medium finish. Accompany with slow cooked BBQ pork, chicken mole, or spinach mushroom casserole.

Name: Rosso di Montalcino
Wine Description: Deep, intense ruby red colour. Ethereal, deep, balanced nose with a rich scent of fruit, full bodied round taste.
